resources.string:
Parkrun is a 5km running challenge that takes place every Saturday at 9:00am. Greenhead Park Run takes place at Greenhead Park in Huddersfield.

The event is free but we ask that you register at www.parkrun.org.uk/register before attending for the first time. Don't forget to bring your barcode!

Parkrun is meant for everyone. Please come along at run at your own pace. Greenhead Park has a great cafe to enjoy a beverage and snack at afterwards. If you want to challenge yourself, keep track of your previous time.
We recommend you bring sports wear and supportive trainers.
Food is available at the greenhead park cafe. Alternatively you can bring a small snack or we suggest eating breakfast beforehand!
There are no changing faciilites on site. There are toilets available in the cafe aslong as you make a purchase and parking is available for free.
This event is completely free for anyone and everyone.
